text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus phlebophyllus is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Costa Rica, Guatemala, Honduras, and Nicaragua.
text.References: Nelson, C. (1998). "Lonchocarpus phlebophyllus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30684A9566312. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30684A9566312.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
